Package com.blakfx.chat

Class MessageCacheInMemory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blakfx.chat.MessageCacheInMemory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageCache
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConflatedMessageCacheInMemory
    public class MessageCacheInMemory
extends Object
implements MessageCache
    An implementation of a MessageCache in memory. Shared message cache, and private message cache both are instances of this class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger log
      This class' private Logger instance.
      private int MAX_CACHE_ELEMENTS
      The maximum number of messages (per contact) the private cache can hold at a given moment.
      private MessageCache parentCache
      The parent cache of this cache.
      private Map<String,​List<String>> privateCache
      The cache/history of private messages (on a per-user basis) sent/received.

                                  String aMessage,
                                  boolean shouldPrint)

        Specified by:
        saveContactMessage in interface MessageCache
        Parameters:

        aMessage - The file notification or text content to add
